data.Title: Google Search Console Link Report Fixed After Glitch
data.Description: The Google Search Console link report is now showing the correct link count after a bug caused a significant decline in reported links for many sites.

data.Title: Google to Stop Indexing Sites Inaccessible on Mobile Devices After July 5th
data.Description: Google has announced that starting July 5th, 2024, it will no longer index websites that are not accessible on mobile devices, marking the completion of its mobile-first indexing initiative.

data.Title: Google Search Algorithm Volatility Observed on June 1st
data.Description: Google Search experienced significant ranking volatility on June 1st, 2024, with many websites seeing major fluctuations in their rankings.

data.Title: Google AI Overviews Visibility Declines, Now Appearing for 15% of Queries
data.Description: New research from BrightEdge reveals that Google's AI Overviews feature is appearing less frequently in search results, now triggering for only 15% of queries.

data.Title: SEOs Explore Optimizing for Google's AI Overviews Feature
data.Description: SEO professionals are experimenting with ways to optimize websites for inclusion in Google's AI Overviews, aiming to leverage the feature for increased visibility and traffic.

data.Title: Instagram Tests Unskippable Ads with Countdown Timers
data.Description: Instagram is experimenting with a new ad format that features unskippable ads with countdown timers, potentially impacting user experience and raising concerns among advertisers.

data.Title: LinkedIn Reduces Image Size in Organic Post Link Previews
data.Description: LinkedIn has updated its link preview format for organic posts, reducing the size of displayed images, which could impact engagement and click-through rates.

data.Title: Spotify Raises Premium Subscription Price in the US to $11.99
data.Description: Spotify is increasing the price of its premium subscription plan in the United States by $1, bringing the monthly cost to $11.99.

data.Title: Microsoft Celebrates Bing's 15th Anniversary
data.Description: Microsoft marked the 15th anniversary of its Bing search engine, with Jordi Ribas, Corporate Vice President for Search and AI, reflecting on the platform's evolution and impact.
